modules.description: Provides functions to locate and install Opam binaries based on system architecture, including opam, opam-installer, and opam-putenv. Works with system architecture identifiers, installation prefixes, and file paths within the staging directory. Used to automate the inclusion of platform-specific Opam tools in installer packages for end-user deployment.

Registers an OCaml component for staging with the OPAM 32 system, ensuring proper initialization during build processes. Operates on internal build configuration structures and component metadata. Used to automate component inclusion in OPAM package definitions for 32-bit environments.
